name: Dream house (itch) (3Mber21)
description:
The game is about trapped inside a haunted house in a dream. The objective is to find a key a escaped out of a dream. Beware of randomly spawn bat, ghost and the steampunk Robo and items such as health-pills and batteries will randomly spawn in the room. This game I made for Nokia jam 3.

How to control :

  • left arrow (4) to walk left
  • right arrow (6) to walk right
  • up or down (2 or 8) to enter room or change floor
  • space bar (5) to toggle ultra-bright flashlight to collapse a ghost and start/restart a game

Music and SFX by iLikeCola12

This game made with Godot engine

All sprites and backgrounds are made with Pixelorama
